channel.title: Grovepi on companionway
channel.description: Recent content in Grovepi on companionway

item.title: The GrovePi kit
item.description: Check out GrovePi These kits make working with the Raspberry Pi GPIO pins so simple and clean. I just ordered one of these kits and I will try to write up a review after I work it over. If you are interested in building a quick and easy raspberry pi for experimenting with the “Internet of Things” (aka IoT) platform - this board and kit looks like it will get you there in minutes.
